description: [DarkGate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1111) is distributed in phishing emails containing links to distribute malicious VBS or MSI files.(Citation: Trellix Darkgate 2023) [DarkGate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1111) uses applications such as Microsoft Teams for distributing links to payloads.(Citation: Trellix Darkgate 2023)
